verbs.description: [ARGM-CAU: At the request of Kim Kardashian West] , [ARG0: President Trump] [V: commuted] [ARG1: the life sentence of Alice Johnson , who had served 21 years on cocaine charges] .
At the request of Kim Kardashian West , President Trump commuted the life sentence of Alice Johnson , who [V: had] served 21 years on cocaine charges .
